siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Good news - No bad reviews on Reddit yet! Why did we skip trick or treating to go to a church service? We talk through some reasons in this episode. The big reason ends up being the hymns. (You might even catch Jon singing.) Bottom line is good hymns trump candy…

frontmatter.title: The Best Podcast you Probably Won't Listen To

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Today we kick off the episode arguing semantics. Stan has yet another milkshake story. He attends a place with “Shake” in the name and is underwhelmed. Regular listener Tom, sent us an article via twitter for our (read: Stan’s) opinion. Hear us opine on the…

frontmatter.title: Apple Money Grab... or security concerns?

node.excerpt: Stan and Jon take a look at their current Apple products (specifically Mac) and workflows, talk about their history using Apple products, and take a look at the recently release MacBook Pro as they look toward purchasing updates. Listen in to hear how they use their devices and…
